page.title: 14Wootton Then and Now.
page.content: Mr. M. Hallam,a local history expert came to school and showed slide pictures of what Wootton was like at the turn of the century.Interestingly, the census returns show that the highest level of population has only been 1,200, today it is only about 700. This shows that the village has hardly expanded. Obviously there has been some new housing,but very little has changed over the years.There used to be two butchers shops a blacksmith,a baker's,a slaughter house and a cobbler's shop.Now in 1985 we only have one village shop,and most people have to go to the town to do their major shopping.
